content: अभिमानिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Possessed of selfrespect; <ls>Ki. 1. 31</ls>; <ls>K. 212.</ls> {@--2@} Having a high opinion of oneself, proud, arrogant, conceited. {@--3@} Regarding all objects as referring to one's own self; अभिमानिव्यपदेशस्तु विशेषानुगतिभ्यां <ls>Br. Sūt.</ls> {@--4@} Fancying, pretending, or regarding oneself to be; नरेंद्र° <ls>Dk. 51</ls>; <ls>K. 194.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A form of Agni.
